org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.schewe
Class ScheweConverter.NBW2DRWConverter

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.schewe.ScheweConverter.NBW2DRWConverter
Enclosing class:
ScheweConverter
static class ScheweConverter.NBW2DRWConverter
extends java.lang.Object

This class is the real implementation of the determinization algorithm of Safra-Schewe construction.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
